The person then walks to the right side of the frame, and the cat walks in front of the camera, looking up at the top of the frame. At this time, a hand reaches out from the top of the frame towards the cat's head. The cat raises its head to allow the hand to touch it. White subtitles are displayed at the top of the frame.
